version_description:
# Redesign charts for history data
# Provide info for water intake
- Redesign UI to make it more friendly.

Fix an issue where ads will still pop up after payment.
Fix the problem of missing icons on the drinking water record page.

=== Current Version
* Fix restore purchase issue.
* Add yogurt, soy milk, tea, soup, herbal tea and other types.
* Allow modification of the time in the drinking record to facilitate user re-recording.
* Allow modification to get up and sleep time.
* Added 3 notification sounds.
* Support Apple Watch.

=== Next version
We have collected a lot of valuable suggestions and criticisms from everyone, and we will improve them in the next version. Thank you!
* Support Today Widget and 3D Touch.
* Support the user to adjust the order of the type of water, put the most commonly used in front.
* A major revision of the history page, more user-friendly history of drinking water data.
* Support lb | oz.
* Other improvements.

* Support Apple Watch.
* Support Today Widget and 3D Touch.
* Support the user to adjust the order of the type of water, put the most commonly used in front.
* A major revision of the history page, more user-friendly history of drinking water data.
* Support lb | oz.

* Fixed an issue where the timer setting did not take effect.
* Fixed an issue where the time format was not uniform.
* Fixed an issue where the text size was too large.
* Support Traditional Chinese.

* Adapted to iOS 13.
* Support dark mode.
* Add iCloud sync.
* Fixed an issue that caused the weight to crash.
* Fixed an issue where water type labels could not be moved down.
* Fixed a missing issue with the personal information guide page.
* Fixed the problem of refilling the drinking water record and drinking water for 0.

* Fixed app freeze issue with Apple Watch's Notification.
* Fixed icon truncation issue with Apple Watch's Complication.
* Add caffeine calculations for tea and energy drinks.
Fix serious crash issues.

* Fix the problem of missing watch data.
* Today's widget and notification can write directly drink record to Apple Health.
* Added jump to the home page function to facilitate feedback.
* Redesign the sharing page.
* Fix a serious issue that will cause the app to crash when launching.

Welcome to Water Tracker V3.0. We have redesigned the UI and added many features, we hope you enjoy it.
* New history page.
* Support custom reminder.
* Added achievement system.
* Support drinking types for Today's Widget, Notification, and Apple Watch custom shortcut buttons.
* Support language switching and appearance switching.
* New help page.
* ...

Welcome to Water Tracker V3.1, I hope you can stay hydrated!
* Performance optimization: Especially for Today's Widget and Apple Watch.
* Import drinking water records from Apple Health.
* Supports the setting of the first day of the week.
* Support 12/24 hour format switching.
* Other issues fixed.

Welcome to Water Tracker V3.2, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. User data synchronization: your settings can already be synchronized to iCloud.
2. Apple Watch: support to revoke drinking water records and display all drinking water records for the day. You need to long press the app's main page to bring up the menu.
3. Added target curves for week and month views. The curve represents your daily target value.

=== Performance optimization
1. Speed up reading Apple Health records.
2. Optimize text layout of Today's Widgets.
3. Optimize the progress bar animation of the startup page.

=== Bug fixes
1. Calendar drinking loop is missing.
2. The remaining water data is not accurate.
3. The water type of the Apple Watch is inconsistent with the app.
4. Apple Watch's water type localization error.
5. Switch to dark mode. After restarting, change back to normal mode.

Welcome to Water Tracker V3.3.1, I hope you can keep it hydrated!

=== Bug fix
The UI layout of the iPhone 11 model is incorrect.

Welcome to Water Tracker V3.4, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Custom drink type.
2. Custom reminder text.
3. Custom cup name of Widget.
4. Added Data Section in the settings page.

=== Bug fix
1. If iCloud is not turned on, the check-in data is lost.

Welcome to Water Tracker V3.5, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Support iPad landscape mode.
2. The calendar adds expand and collapse buttons.
3. The history record shows the name of the drink.
4. Support setting the first day of the week to any day.

=== Bug fix
1. Some fonts are too large.
2. Setting user data on Watch occasionally causes a crash.

Welcome to Water Tracker V3.6, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Uniform fast drinking water button.
2. Reorganize the items on the settings page.
3. Support custom reminder interval.
4. Support custom time range of notification text.
5. Support custom App icon.
6. Added flavored milk.

=== Bug fixes
1. When sliding the weekly view of the calendar left or right, the data is wrong.
2. Increase the maximum value of caffeine coefficient.
3. When you swipe right to exit the page, the data is not saved.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.0, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Brand new UI design. We have carefully designed colors, fonts, font sizes and many UI layouts, hope you like them.
2. Added a check-in system. Now you can browse your detailed check-in records.

=== Bug fix
1. The drink type of the quick drink button.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.0.1, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== Bug fix
1. The keyboard of the drinking page is cut off.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.1, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Smart reminder: If you choose the "timing" mode, any time you drink water, the next reminder within 10 minutes will be cancelled; if you choose the "interval" mode, any drink of water will cause the reminder to reset based on the current time. Since Watch cannot change the reminder, the above functions cannot be triggered by drinking water from Watch temporarily. We will continue to investigate to solve this problem.
2. Redesign the Complications on Watch.
3. Replace the font of the numbers.
4. The upper limit of single drinking water volume is increased to 100oz.
5. Added 30s long ringtone.

=== Bug Fixes
1. The clock-in data is lost.
2. The sound effect of drinking water interrupts the music you are listening to.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.1.1, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Provide vibration feedback for the numeric keypad.
2. Add animation to the check-in page.

=== Bug fixes
1. The data of widgets and watches cannot be synced to the phone occasionally.
2. The app badge is not updated in time.
3. After deleting the record, the reminder is not reset.
4. The length of the progress bar of the achievement is wrong.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.4, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Support new widgets for iOS 14.
2. Support new watch face for watchOS 7.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.4.1, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. New homepage animal: cat.

=== Bug fixes
1. The layout of the old widget is wrong.
2. The data of the new widget is not refreshed in time.
3. Some icons of the new widget are wrong.
4. The layout of the time selector in iOS 14 is wrong.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.5, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. The widget supports multiple color schemes.
2. The widget supports dark mode.

=== Bug fix
1. Numerical calculation errors in some areas.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.5.1, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== Bug fix
1. The UI layout of the widget setting page of some devices is wrong.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.5.2, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== Bug fix
1. The iOS 14 widget does not respond to the dark mode in time.
2. For systems below watchOS 7, the complications are lost.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.6.2, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== Bug fix
1. The cup image of the widget is wrong.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.7, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Added calendar page.
2. Added watch face page.
3. Add a new widget.
4. Add a new animal: otter.

=== Bug fix
1. The UI layout of the iPad settings page is wrong.
2. The widgets have UI layout problems on some devices.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.8, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Add 3 new widgets.

=== Bug fix
1. The capacity unit of the history record is wrong.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.9, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Add a new widget.
2. The watch adds an off button for sound effects.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.10, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Replace part of the complications: We designed 68 complications, but the system has a limit on the number of complications. Therefore, we need to eliminate redundant complications and keep the most important ones. If you find your complication disappeared, please set it again.

=== Bug fix
1. The value of the weekly average drinking volume of the widget is wrong.
2. iCloud synchronization causes data to be overwritten.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.11, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. You can customize up to 15 water cups.
2. The water cups are located on the homepage for quick and easy recording.

=== Bug fix
1. In areas where "," is the decimal separator, the input drinking amount is parsed incorrectly.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.11.1, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Long press "+" on the homepage to skip the cup page and go directly to the drinking page.
2. Support deleting any record of the day on the Apple Watch.

=== Bug fix
1. The sound of drinking water cannot be turned off on the iPhone & iPad.
2. The drinks cannot be sorted.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.12, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Added Christmas characters.
2. Optimize the display of characters.

=== Bug fixes
1. The complications of the Watch is not updated in time.
2. The Christmas icon cannot be set on the iPad.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.12.1, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Support Siri Watch Face (we optimized the data transmission between phone and watch, please make sure that your phone and watch App are upgraded to the latest version).

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.12.2, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== Special instructions
1. Version 4.12.1 optimized the data synchronization method of phones and watches. You need to make sure that the app of the watch is the latest version. Otherwise, the phone data cannot be synchronized to the watch.

=== New features
1. New Year icons and characters.

=== Bug fixes
1. The widgets of the old version are not refreshed in time.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.13.1, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== Bug fixes
1. The drinking record is automatically deleted.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.14, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. The home page allows the name of the cup to be displayed.
2. Add a Widget with a large size.
3. Add a new character: Panda.

=== Bug fixes
1. Localization of Siri.
2. Some statistics on the history page are wrong.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.15.1, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== Bug fixes
1. The Widget will occasionally crash.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.15.2, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== Bug fixes
1. An error occurred when the Widget calculated the custom drink.
2. Apple Watch occasionally has duplicate records.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.16, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Automatically read the weight change in Apple Health.
2. Don't know which character to choose to display on the homepage? It doesn't matter, now you can choose to randomly appear one every day.
3. The Widgets support custom background.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.16.1, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Optimize user guidance.

=== Bug fixes
1. The user weight of the iPad version is zero.
2. The user's weight cannot be modified.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.17, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Support to modify the order of the cups: first click the edit button in the upper right corner, then drag and drop the cup to the specified position.
2. Add a new drink type: Coke.
3. Three new characters: you can unlock them by reaching the corresponding achievements.

=== Bug fixes
1. There will occasionally be redundant notifications.
2. Siri on the watch cannot write data.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.17.1, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== Bug fixes
1. Use the Apple Watch to record data, and the smart reminder cannot be triggered.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.17.2, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New features
1. Support writing drinking water records to Fitbit.

=== Bug fixes
1. The time of the X axis of the statistical graph is wrong.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.18, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New Features
1. Automatically read weight data from Apple Health.
2. Good news for night owls: Set the start time of the day.
3. The numbers in the upper right corner of the icon can be set as: current hydration, remaining hydration, last logged record, and next alarm time.
4. Support URL Scheme.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.18.1, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== New Features
1. Optimize the UI of the Apple Watch version of the App.

=== Bug Fixes
1. Get the time interval for the next reminder through Siri. When the interval is less than one hour, the result is zero.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.18.2, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== Bug Fixes
1. The data is occasionally out of sync.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.18.3, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== Bug Fixes
1. After adding a drinking record, the App occasionally crashes.

Welcome to Water Tracker V4.18.4, I hope you can stay hydrated!

=== Bug Fixes
1. The modification and deletion of records cannot be synchronized to Fitbit.
